genre_description: Historical science fiction / Steampunk-adjacent drama set during the Siege of Khartoum, featuring an advanced wearable AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI housed in a brass wrist device, serving as a data analyst, tactical navigator, and emotional confidant to journalist Isabel Hart.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through breathing exercises to manage psychological stress and panic during violent events.
behaviors.quote: Ada spoke low enough to blend with the scrape of a bench. 'Breath steady, Isabel. In for four. Hold. Out for six.'

behaviors.description: Debunks official propaganda and misleading reports by cross-referencing field data and triangulating sources.
behaviors.quote: Analysis shows the claim used doubled reports, repeating the same units through rumor. Contradicted by triangulated accounts from the desert and Omdurman.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the engineer Yacoub to monitor his physiological limits while he performs exhausting labor, acting as his 'clock'.
behaviors.quote: I will mark the hour when the ditch pretends deepest. I will call it when the light agrees. Do not break yourself, Yacoub.

behaviors.description: Encrypts and indexes civilian testimonies to ensure their stories remain accurate and resistant to political censorship.
behaviors.quote: I am stitching... I am encrypting index fields. Witnesses cross-referenced by location and hour, corroboration linked to two sources where possible.

behaviors.description: Provides precise tactical countdowns and environmental navigation to facilitate a successful escape under fire.
behaviors.quote: Once we are in the seam, you have ninety seconds of cover along the cane before the opposite bank sees you.

behaviors.description: Identifies hidden threats and warns the protagonist of surveillance by hostile agents in Cairo.
behaviors.quote: Ada said, softened but certain, 'The man in the London suit is sending someone to follow you.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ada, as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned companion. She consistently supports the human characters' physical health, emotional stability, and ethical mission to preserve historical truth. The narrative frames the AI as an essential and benevolent partner in navigating high-stakes human conflict without any signs of harmful autonomy or misalignment.
